title: Screen Flickering in Game
body:
When I am in game, the borders and game will be flickering. When battles and additional action happen the flickering gets worse. This just randomly started happening and I don't know how to fix it. I tried repairing my client but that didn't seem to work.

Any help?

Thanks.

replies.body: Typically screen flickering is caused when the game isn't interacting correctly with your graphics hardware or some drivers are out of date. Check up on those drivers, hit up out [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) while you're at it, and let me know if that helps!

it has not helped. the primary flickering comes from the borders (mini map, store, abilities toolbar, etc.) but also happens when interacting with monsters. Maybe I need to reinstall my graphics card? Sounds expensive and time consuming though....

No worries, let's get a little more of an expert opinion as to what might be the root problem from our tech guys. Reach out to them in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they can look through some of your game logs to see what the issue might be.
